name: Fishing Tuna
description: FishingTuna is a deflationary daily return platform that offers investors a daily return of 1% daily return on their investment up to 250% of their principal amount. The reward comes in the form of a 4% tax on all transactions. Its TUNA token is a BEP-20 token on Binance Smart Chain (BSC), which provides token holders and platform investors with up to 1.6% increased returns. For example, if you deposit $1,000 into FishingTuna, you pay 4% tax on the deposit and receive 1% on the remaining $960 every day. You don't get your principal back, but you can get up to 250% of it in rewards, in this case $2,400 (250%*$960). Having TUNA tokens in your wallet, your income increases to 1.6% per day until you receive 250% profit All investors of the FishingTuna project receive a 1.5% bonus in TUNA tokens
